response.original_title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Reproductive Rights - Know Your Rights
response.overview: The history of American women's reproductive rights from Colonial times to the present. Social customs, legislation and court decisions have impacted American womenâ€™s right to control their own bodies. Abortion and contraception restrictions as well as involuntary sterilization have galvanized women to work towards reproductive justice.
response.tagline: The history of American women's reproductive rights from Colonial times to the present.
response.title: Stand UP, Speak OUT: Reproductive Rights - Know Your Rights
